locations.name: Mani Peninsula
locations.description: A rugged region in the southern Peloponnese known for its distinctive stone tower houses, wild beauty, and history of independence. The exact town/village isn't specified, but the stay is within this peninsula (using Areopoli coordinates as a central reference).

locations.name: Monemvasia
locations.description: A stunning medieval fortress town built on a small island rock connected to the mainland by a causeway, famed for its romantic atmosphere and historical significance.

locations.name: Porto Heli
locations.description: A cosmopolitan harbour town on the eastern Peloponnese coast, known as part of the 'Greek Riviera', offering upscale relaxation and access to islands like Spetses and Hydra.
